/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is teeming with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The buildings lining the street are painted in shades of white and gray, adding to the urban feel of the scene. The street itself is lined with trees, providing a touch of greenery amidst the concrete structures.
